text.section: The board may proceed against an approved provider on its own initiative, on the basis of either information contained in its own records, or information obtained through its informal investigation.

If a formal complaint verified by affidavit is filed with the board by a responsible citizen or organization containing allegations that if true would warrant action, the board may proceed against the approved provider.
Any final order of the board may be appealed to the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 23, effective April 11, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 145, effective July 15, 1998.
